product_name: Lole Silhouette Up Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Make tough workouts look easy in the feminine styling and technical finesse of the Lole Silhouette Up Tank Top. It's a workout winner with its internal bra and moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric. Nylon and elastane fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and helps protect skin with a UPF rating of 50+. Integrated inner bra offers light support; compatible with soft cups to personalize fit (cups not included). The Lole Silhouette Up Tank Top features a 25 in. length. Rear pocket stores your media player; reflective logo.
short_description: Make tough workouts look easy in the feminine styling and technical finesse of the Lole Silhouette Up Tank Top. It's a workout winner with its internal bra and moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric.
